data.requestSQL:
SELECT * 
                       FROM sf1104.users a, sf1104.artifact b 
                       WHERE a.user_id = b.submitted_by AND b.artifact_id = 304727
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT group_id) FROM SourceForge import sf0314.user_group

data.indicatorDescription: Total number of developers per project
data.requestSQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SourceForge import sf0314.user_group WHERE group_id = 78745
